name: The skull of the Berserker-King
data: It increases the users strength phenomenally.
It decreases the users dexterity impressively.
It decreases the users intelligence unbelievably much.
It has excellent armour class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It decreases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'rage'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'berserk'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'ignore pain'.
The skull of the Berserker-King makes its wearer more vulnerable to backstabs.
